tool_description:
Get the latest news and updates on ChatGPT and OpenAI with this API. Easily retrieve information on new developments, research, and product releases from the leading AI research organization in the world. Stay informed and stay ahead of the curve with the OpenAI News API.

This API can be useful to seed contents for your blogs, websites and apps.
name: ChatGPT and OpenAI News API
title: ChatGPT and OpenAI News API

api_list.name: List of newspapers
api_list.description: This end-point returns list of leading newspapers currently seeding news around ChatGPT and OpenAI.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-and-openai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/newspapers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-and-openai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get News from Specific Newspaper
api_list.description: This endpoint will return latest news and updates on ChatGPT and OpenAI from specific newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-and-openai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/wired"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-and-openai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-and-openai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-and-openai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All ChatGPT and OpenAI News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news from around the world about ChatGPT and OpenAI.

print(response.json())
